MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the EH16 postcode area of Edinburgh. We had no advance warning of power issues in the area and only became aware of it at 5:04am. Our engineers have arrived onsite and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:42am on 13th February 2021
